p: In order to accelerate the migration rate of electrons in TiO 2, inhibit the recombination of the electron and hole, improve the photoresponse range of TiO 2 and improve the photocatalytic efficiency of TiO 2, TiO 2 was modified by the in-situ doping of Fe 3+ ions by precipitation at 800 rpm in IS-RPB. The catalyst was characterized after being calcinated at 500 Â°C.
